LanguageData.VRE_HemogenPipe.label: гемогенна труба
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenPipe.description: A pipe that’s used to transport hemogen between taps, drains, vats and hemogen-fueled structures.
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenPipe_Blueprint.label: hemogen pipe (blueprint)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenPipe_Frame.label: hemogen pipe (building)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenPipe_Frame.description: A pipe that’s used to transport hemogen between taps, drains, vats and hemogen-fueled structures.
LanguageData.VRE_UndergroundHemogenPipe.label: підземна гемогенна труба
LanguageData.VRE_UndergroundHemogenPipe.description: Subterranean steel pipes designed to transport hemogen between taps, drains, vats and hemogen-fueled structures.
LanguageData.VRE_UndergroundHemogenPipe_Frame.label: subterranean hemogen pipe (building)
LanguageData.VRE_UndergroundHemogenPipe_Frame.descrip: Subterranean steel pipes designed to transport hemogen between taps, drains, vats and hemogen-fueled structures.
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenValve.label: гемогенний клапан
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenValve_Blueprint.label: hemogen valve (blueprint)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenValve_Frame.label: hemogen valve (building)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenVat.label: гемогенний бак
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenVat.description: An industrial liquid storage vat meant for storing hemogen delivered via hemogen pipe network. Vats can be designated to be siphoned for usable hemogen as needed.
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenVat_Blueprint.label: hemogen vat (blueprint)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenVat_Frame.label: hemogen vat (building)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenVat_Frame.description: An industrial liquid storage vat meant for storing hemogen delivered via hemogen pipe network. Vats can be designated to be siphoned for usable hemogen as needed.
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenTap.label: гемогенний кран
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenTap.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to dispense hemogen for later use.
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenTap_Blueprint.label: hemogen tap (blueprint)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenTap_Blueprint_Install.label: hemogen tap (blueprint)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenTap_Frame.label: hemogen tap (building)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenTap_Frame.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to dispense hemogen for later use.
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenDrain.label: гемогенний залив
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenDrain.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to input hemogen into the network, filling up connected vats.
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenDrain_Blueprint.label: hemogen drain (blueprint)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenDrain_Blueprint_Install.label: hemogen drain (blueprint)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenDrain_Frame.label: hemogen drain (building)
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenDrain_Frame.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to input hemogen into the network, filling up connected vats.
LanguageData.VRE_Draincasket.label: труна гемовикачування
LanguageData.VRE_Draincasket.description:
Зловісний пристрій, призначений для викачування гемогену з тіла людини, підтримуючи її втан в достатньому для утворення гемогена.

Виробляє 2 пакети гемогену на день, якщо жертва ситна і труна підключена до гемогенного баку. Якщо жертва буде голодна, труна виснажить її до смерті приблизно за 2 дні.

Якщо у вас є Vanilla Nutrient Paste Expanded ви можете підключити подачу поживної пасти до труни.
LanguageData.VRE_Draincasket_Blueprint.label: труна гемовикачування (blueprint)
LanguageData.VRE_Draincasket_Frame.label: труна гемовикачування (building)
LanguageData.VRE_Draincasket_Frame.description:
A sinister contraption designed to extract hemogen from an individual while maintaining their life force at the barest minimum. This dark and foreboding casket houses its occupant in a twilight state of existence with their body slowly drained of precious hemogen. Bound to their Draincasket, the occupant's survival depends on being fed regularly, as they can still starve to death.

Produces 2 hemogen packs a day as long as the occupant has food and the casket is connected to a hemogen network. If deprived of food, the casket will kill its occupant in around 2 days.

If you have Vanilla Nutrient Paste Expanded it will draw nutrients from that network, as long as there is more than 1 meal unit available.
